import React from 'react' import { Card, Col, Container, Row, Stack } from 'react-bootstrap' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import splash1 from '../images/splash-1.svg' import splash2 from '../images/splash-2.svg' import splash3 from '../images/splash-3.svg' import githublogo from '../images/github-logo.jpeg' import landingPage from '../images/landing-page.jpg' const SplashPage = (props) => { return (
React App React + Bootstrap Welcome to my React Social Media App. This is a mock website soley made to test my own skills. You can make an account but it will not be saved after you leave. Next step is to learn MongoDB and Docker to help maintain a real database. Front End Technologies Reusable Components Built with React,React-Bootstrap,React-Router-Dom,Formik and more to come. Web Dev Simplified Learning Frameworks Testing new technologies. Check out my Github! More Projects Github Repo!
) } export default SplashPage
